news.title: Applebee’s and IHOP Embrace AI for Enhanced Customer Service
news.body: Applebee’s and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are rolling out AI tools across 3,500 locations to boost customer service and operational efficiency. This strategic integration aims to transform the dining experience and optimize kitchen operations, setting a new standard for technology adoption in the restaurant industry.

news.title: UK Government Expands Open Banking with Smart Data Group
news.body: The UK has launched the Smart Data Group to extend open banking principles to other sectors, potentially unlocking £28 billion in economic value. This initiative will broaden data sharing and consumer benefits, revolutionizing how industries leverage financial technology for growth.

news.title: Visa Boosts Stablecoin Use for Cross-border Payments
news.body: Visa is expanding its stablecoin strategy in the CEMEA region to facilitate USD transactions via blockchain. This move is pivotal for Visa as it integrates digital currencies into its global payment network, potentially reshaping international transaction dynamics.

news.title: Coinbase Introduces Global Stablecoin Payment Service
news.body: Coinbase has launched a stablecoin payment service to enable easier USDC acceptance by online merchants worldwide. This service is designed to simplify transactions and enhance the adoption of stablecoins in e-commerce, marking a significant shift in digital payment methods.

news.title: SoftBank to Build $1 Trillion AI and Robotics Hub in Arizona
news.body: SoftBank's CEO, Masayoshi Son, plans to establish a $1 trillion AI and robotics complex in Arizona, aiming to partner with major tech firms like TSMC. This project could dramatically alter the tech landscape and stimulate economic growth in the region.
